price: 8. Na oyo mpe asalaki mabe moke lokola mbuma zelo akomona yango.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
